text: Ki ha’la tōmālōkara! Yētiẏā tōmālōkara ōparata bipada āhilē (uhudara yud'dhata) tētiẏā tōmālōkē ka’ba dharailā, ‘ē'iṭō kara paraā āhila’? Athaca tōmālōkē dbiguṇa bipada ghaṭiẏā'ichilā (badarara yud'dhata). Kōraā, ‘ē'iṭō tōmālōkara nijara (dōṣara) kāraṇē'i āhichē’; niścaẏa āllāha sakalō bastura ōparata pūrṇa kṣamatābāna
